attributes.name: seaBedX
attributes.description: Global x-coordinate of the line end point anchored at the sea bed

attributes.name: seaBedY
attributes.description: Global y-coordinate of the line end point anchored at the sea bed

attributes.name: vesselX
attributes.description: X-coordinate of the line end point attached to the vessel (given in the body fixed coordinate system)

attributes.name: vesselY
attributes.description: Y-coordinate of the line end point attached to the vessel (given in the body fixed coordinate system)
